entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is present in the scene where Charlie brings eggs for the Horntail. He lets out a moan of longing when he sees the eggs.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is Hagrid's brother and is also present in the scene where he brings eggs for the Horntail. He sternly tells Hagrid that he has counted the eggs.

entities.name: horntail
entities.description: The Horntail is a dragon that Charlie brings eggs for. It is present in its enclosure and is being cared for by Charlie.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned in the conversation between Hagrid and Charlie. Charlie expresses concern about Harry's safety due to his involvement in the tournament.

relationships.description: Charlie is caring for the Horntail by bringing it eggs.
Hagrid has a longing for the eggs that Charlie brings.
Charlie tells Hagrid that he has counted the eggs.
Charlie expresses concern about Harry's safety due to his involvement in the tournament.
